channel.title: efficient unemployment rate on Pascal Michaillat
channel.description: Recent content in efficient unemployment rate on Pascal Michaillat

item.title: u* = âˆšuv: The Full-Employment Rate of Unemployment in the United States
item.description: This paper argues that in the United States the full-employment rate of unemployment is the geometric average of the unemployment and vacancy rates.

item.title: Beveridgean Unemployment Gap
item.description: This paper develops a formula for the unemployment gap based on the Beveridge curve. In the US the gap is countercyclical. Published in JPubE Plus, 2021.
